sen.j: 鳴滝駅（なるたきえき）は、京都市右京区鳴滝嵯峨園町にある京福電気鉄道京福電気鉄道北野線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Narutaki Station is a railroad station on the Keifuku Electric Railroad Kitano Line located in Narutaki Sagasono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Narutaki Station, located in Narutaki Sagasono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a railroad facility on the Kitano Line of the Keifuku Electric Railroad.
Narutaki Station, located in Narutaki Sagasono-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a railroad facility on the Kitano Line of the Keifuku Electric Railroad.
Its station number is B3.
Its station number is B3.
Its station number is B3.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線ホームを持つ地上駅。
sen.e: Narutaki Station is a ground station that has a pair of platforms facing each other with two railroad tracks running in between.
Narutaki Station is a ground station that has a pair of platforms facing each other with two railroad tracks running in between.
Narutaki Station is a ground station that has a pair of platforms facing each other with two railroad tracks running in between.

sen.j: 嵐電の駅では唯一の駅構内踏切（第4種）で2つのホームは結ばれている。
sen.e: This is the only station among Randen Line stations that has a railway crossing inside the station structure (type 4) that connects the two platforms.
This is the only station among those of the Randen Line whose structure (type 4) contains a railway crossing that connects the two platforms.
This is the only station among those of the Randen Line whose structure (type 4) contains a railway crossing within the station premise that connects the two platforms.
sen.cmt: 駅構内→within the station premiseとしました。

sen.j: この駅と常盤駅の間は複線になっている。
sen.e: The line between this station and Tokiwa Station is double-tracked.
The line between this station and Tokiwa Station is double-tracked.
The line between this station and Tokiwa Station is double-tracked.

sen.j: 出入り口は帷子ノ辻方面行きホームにはホーム中ほどに1ヶ所、北野白梅町方面行きホームにはホームの両端2箇所にある。
sen.e: There is an entrance to the station in the middle of the platform for trains for Katabira-no-tsuji and an entrance at each end of the platform for trains for Kitano Hakubai-cho.

There is an entrance to the station in the middle of the platform to serve trains bound for Katabira-no-tsuji, as well as an entrance at each end of the platform to serve trains bound for Kitano Hakubai-cho.

There is an entrance to the station in the middle of the platform to serve trains bound for Katabiranotsuji, as well as an entrance at each end of the platform to serve trains bound for Kitano-Hakubaicho.
sen.cmt: 駅名中のハイフンを削除しました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 鳴滝～宇多野間の「桜のトンネル」
sen.e: The Cherry Tunnel between Narutaki and Utano
The Cherry Tunnel between Narutaki and Utano
The Cherry Tunnel between Narutaki and Utano

sen.j: - 春の桜開花シーズンにに夜間ライトアップされる。
sen.e: The tunnel is illuminated at night during the cherry blossom season in spring.
The tunnel is illuminated at night during the cherry-blossom season in spring.
The tunnel is illuminated at night during the cherry-blossom season in spring.

sen.j: 画像は、京福電気鉄道北野線桜のトンネルを参照。
sen.e: See an article on the Cherry Tunnel of the Keifuku Electric Railroad for photos of the tunnel.
For photos of the tunnel, see the article on the Cherry Tunnel of the Keifuku Electric Railroad.
For photos of the tunnel, see the article on the Cherry Tunnel of the Kitano Line of the Keifuku Electric Railroad.
sen.cmt: 北野線 を追加しました。

sen.j: 1926年（大正15年）3月10日 - 京都電燈の駅として開業。
sen.e: Narutaki Station opened as a Kyoto Electric Railroad station.
Narutaki Station opened as a facility of the Kyoto Electric Railroad.
March 10, 1026: The facility started as Narutaki Station, being operated by Kyoto Dento, an electric power company.
sen.cmt: 日付を追加しました。原文に合わせて訳し直しました。

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）3月2日 - 路線継承により京福電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: The station became a Keifuku Electric Railroad station as a result of the change in the company name.
The station became a Keifuku Electric Railroad facility as a result of the change in the company's name.
March 2, 1942: It became a station under the control of Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., a company that succeeded to the railway.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Keifuku Electric Railroad
Keifuku Electric Railroad
Keifuku Electric Railroad
Kitano Line
Kitano Line
Kitano Line

sen.j: 宇多野駅 B4 - 鳴滝駅 B3 - 常盤駅 (京都府) B2
sen.e: Utano Station B4 - Narutaki Station B3 - Tokiwa Station (Kyoto Prefecture) B2
Utano Station B4 - Narutaki Station B3 - Tokiwa Station (Kyoto Prefecture) B2
Utano Station (B4) - Narutaki Station (B3) - Tokiwa Station (Kyoto Prefecture) (B2)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一し、駅番号に括弧を追加しました。
